snippet: Classes offer the opportunity to continue education from the comfort of home, but they can restrict the chance to build in-person social connections.
abstract: More retirees are drawn to online learning classes, which can provide a sampling of wide variety of classes from top-notch universities without having to travel; one drawback can be sense of isolation.
lead_paragraph: Classes offer the opportunity to continue education from the comfort of home, but they can restrict the chance to build in-person social connections.

headline.main: Free Online Courses Keep Retirees in the Know
headline.print_headline: More at Ease Online, Retirees Tap Free Courses
